fulltext:
TRAN PHU QUOC 
67/33 Tran Ke Xuong, W7, Dis Phu Nhuan, HCMC  
SUMMARY: 
• Graduated  from  HCMC University of Technology and Education + Professional Diploma in 
Information Technology/DNIIT. 
• I’m a software engineer with 3 years in experience. 
• I have 3 years in experience as front-end by using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Angular2-7 and ReactJS (code 
basic and research) 
• In back-end, I have 16 months in NodeJS. 
• I am very optimistic, self-motivated, and most importantly, I am not afraid of new challenges and willing to go 
above and beyond to deliver high quality work. 
• I enjoy working in team as well as working independently. 
• Besides that, I am curious and interested in software engineering and new technology. 
EDUCATION: 
•   HCMC University of Technology and Education 
(Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam) 
An Information Technology Engineer (2010-2014) 
• NITT College (Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam) 
Professional Diploma in Information Technology/DNIIT, (November 2013) 
OBJECTIVE: 
• Being a Chief Technology Officer in next 8 years. 
• Travel around the world when I get retired. 
INTERESTS: 
• Music, reading, swimming, traveling, outdoor activities, playing football. 
NOTABLE EXPERIENCE/SKILLS (1→ 10): 
Study and go to work 
• Angular 2-7+ 
• JavaScript 
• HTML – CSS 
• NodeJS 
• ReactJS 
• React Native 
• Java 
• GIT 
Relevant Skills 
• Ability to work under pressure and focus on deadlines/deliverables 
• Strong interpersonal skills, passionate about teamwork 
• Good analytical and searching new technologies. 
• Work hard and Problem solving
